titles: Die Lun√¶, 10 Julii, 1648. It is this day resolved upon the question by the Commons in Parliament assembled, that a printed paper entituled, A motive to all loyal subjects, to endeavor the preservation of his Majesties person; wherein Major General Skippon is slanderously charged with notorious falsities, is a malicious and scandalous libel.
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
notes: Other title information from first lines of text.
Reproduction of original in: Birmingham Central Reference Library.
keywords: Motive to all loyal subjects, to endeavor the preservation of his Majesties person.
